1.title: Episodio 81
1.plot: The Hawks are celebrating great news. Gabo gets mysterious messages. Diego is unmasked. Lorenzo makes a decision regarding his relationship with Gabo. A drone follows the friends.

2.title: Episodio 82
2.plot: The boys get the Colombian classmate Martín Mejía, who turns out to be a nuisance. Lorenzo tells Diego that he already knows that he is also Gabo's father.

3.title: Episodio 83
3.plot: A very special, new student is coming. Also, there are strange video messages. Diego complicates the situation of the school. Lorenzo challenges his father and reveals a secret.

4.title: Episodio 84
4.plot: Diego and Gabo confront each other with their personal connection. Isabel and Francisco are looking for a solution to the financial problems. Francisco and Vitto are struggling with the complications of their new posts.

5.title: Episodio 85
5.plot: Gabo realizes that the messages he receives are not advertising, but something mysterious. Joaquín interviews the Machetes. Félix suspends Ezequiel from training.

6.title: Episodio 86
6.plot: Joaquín informs the Hawks of their next opponents - the Guards. Diego wants to grab the IAD and forces Isabel to decide between two evils. Ezequiel comes to training, but Félix doesn't want to see him there.

7.title: Episodio 87
7.plot: Gabo has to retake the ball to pass the mysterious test. Francisco faces the decision to bring Ezequiel back into the Hawks team. Diego deletes the volleyball group's journey and the girls demand an explanation.

8.title: Episodio 88
8.plot: Zoe is disappointed and angry at Gabo's behavior. Ezequiel returns to the Hawks. When Gabo and Diego drive to the airport to pick up the guards, Gabo wants to persuade Diego to reconsider his decision regarding the volleyball team.

9.title: Episodio 89
9.plot: Adrián installs a camera at the football field so that the Hawks can watch what happens there, but the Guards beat them. Ezequiel starts training with the Hawks and shows what he can do.

10.title: Episodio 90
10.plot: Diego announces that the Hawks can drop out of school hours to focus on the sport. In addition, he forbids Joaquín to transfer the upcoming game against the Guards - for dubious reasons.

1.title: Una propuesta, una pasión
1.plot: Felipe and Gabo live in a small village near Buenos Aires and dream of a football career. One day, Señor Vitto, a representative of a football academy, appears and has to decide whom he will offer a scholarship to.

2.title: Una mal bienvenida, una pasión
2.plot: After arriving at the academy, Gabo immediately becomes friends with his roommates Ricky and Dedé. However, he defeated just the record holder Lorenzo in a penalty, which will turn out to be a big mistake.

3.title: Un nuevo equipo, una pasión
3.plot: The starting signal for a fierce power struggle between Lorenzo and Gabo has fallen. However, Gabo has not only to defend himself against Lorenzo's lousy tricks, but also against his father Diego, who was appointed the new sports director.

4.title: Un mal rendimiento, una pasión (parte 1)
4.plot: Gabo struggles to get his performance up in training - a godsend for Diego, who wants to shut him out of the IAD and deny him the scholarship. It quickly comes to suspicion that things are not right here.

5.title: Un mal rendimiento, una pasión (parte 2)
5.plot: In order to clear Lorenzo's biggest competitor, Lorenzo's father Diego tries to deprive Gabo of the scholarship due to a lack of achievements. Gabo is worried that he has to go back to his village now when Zoe and he approach.

6.title: Un examen, una pasión
6.plot: Lorenzo and Gabo compete for the post of team captain. When Francesco and Diego agree to include school performance as well, Lorenzo's chances rise, unlike Gabos.

7.title: ¡No quiero ser capitán!, una pasión
7.plot: The math test, which makes a decisive contribution to the team captain, creates great tension. Although Lorenzo is in front in all areas, Gabo is well on his way to catch up.

8.title: Entrenamiento extra, una pasión
8.plot: Martina decides to help Gabo with the math exam, which causes great mistrust among his friends. Meanwhile, Lorenzo doesn't miss an opportunity to bully Gabo and let him know he's the better player.

9.title: Calificación del examen, una pasión
9.plot: Ironically, Gabo and Lorenzo have to play in a team, which Lorenzo doesn't like at all. Professor Olson's attempt to show the children a rare snake ends in hallucinations and a visit to the infirmary.

10.title: Un saboteo, una pasión
10.plot: Gabo is horrified by the result of the math test, but he can prove that things are not right. Meanwhile, Martina becomes captain, and Zoe becomes a regular player in the volleyball team.

11.title: Una votación, una pasión
11.plot: Lorenzo tries to pull Mariano and Catorce for the captain's election on his side. But the choice is different than expected. Diego's promising offer of an agency meets with skepticism. Gabo gets the offer of his life.

12.title: Una propuesta a Europa, una pasión
12.plot: Gabo has reservations about accepting the offer to play in Europe. While the Hawks prepare for a game against a professional team, Lorenzo tries to attach Gabo to the theft of the most important trophy of the IAD.

13.title: ¡Desapareció la copa!, una pasión
13.plot: Gabo is still suspected of stealing the trophy, pushing him ever closer to Giovanni's arms. While Dedé and Ricky try to prove his innocence, Lorenzo leaves no stone unturned to uphold the allegations.

14.title: ¿Quién se llevó la copa?, una pasión
14.plot: An anonymous letter assures Gabo's innocence, whereupon Isabel has a new suspicion. Meanwhile, Lorenzo worries about the trophy, which was stolen from Camilo's bag. The meeting on the professional team is different than expected.

15.title: El primer amistoso, una pasión
15.plot: Valentino has to leave the game, whereupon Lorenzo becomes the new captain. Ricky believes he has seen the trophy and goes in search of the half-time. Since the game is going badly for the Hawks, Diego offers Francisco a bet.

16.title: Un festejo, una pasión
16.plot: The Hawks have won the game. When Lorenzo suddenly shows team spirit and makes peace with Gabo, he is elected as the new captain. Gabo decides against the offer as a professional player. A video about the institute causes confusion.

17.title: El video del IAD, una pasión
17.plot: The manipulated video does not only cause irritation to the Ministry of Education. Lorenzo's plan to ban Ricky on the bench takes a turn when the real culprit betrays himself by a gross mistake.

18.title: Sospechas, una pasión
18.plot: Ricky tries to convict Camilo of the crime before he himself will be wrongly accused. While Francisco is dissatisfied with the lineup for the game against the Eagles, these provoke the Hawks. Diego is planning the victory of the first game.

19.title: No hay pruebas, una pasión
19.plot: While Ricky finds nothing on Camilo's tablet, Camilo suspects that his tablet has been replaced. One last idea from Ricky is to ask Amadeo for help. Through Ricky's suspension, Lorenzo's plan of playmaking goes up.

20.title: Comienza la Intercopa, una pasión
20.plot: Although Amadeo has found proof of Camilo's guilt, Lorenzo's betrayal leads him to the director. Due to the expulsion of Camilo from the IAD, the team must be restructured shortly before the game - with serious consequences.

21.title: Una sanción, una pasión
21.plot: After the Hawks have lost the game against the Eagles, they have to endure much scorn and ridicule. Diego is trying to find a substitute for Coach Francisco, who has to make a tough decision on Gabo's and Lorenzo's future.

22.title: El pin de mi papá, una pasión
22.plot: Gabo and Lorenzo have to help Florencio clean up, which especially Gabo doesn't like at first. After Ezequiel tries in vain to threaten Gabo, Gabo learns more about his father's pin.

23.title: El inicio de la búsqueda, una pasión
23.plot: Ricky and Dedé are spurred on by the idea that the pin Gabo found belongs to his father. After Francisco makes an important decision, he receives unexpected support, but he should not be happy too soon.

24.title: De nuevo en el equipo, una pasóin
24.plot: Ricky and Dedé continue to try to find out who Gabo's biological father is. Meanwhile, Martina rejects every single one of Zoe's ideas and Ricky makes a startling discovery that will not be without consequences for Gabo and Zoe.

25.title: La fiesta, una pasión
25.plot: Ricky and Dedé tell Gabo about their theory that Francisco can be his father. Now they must do their best to keep Gabo and Zoe apart and elicit information from Zoe on a very specific coin.

26.title: ¿Zoe es mi hermana?, una pasión
26.plot: To finally find out if Francisco is his natural father, Gabo asks him about his pin. Vitto and Pulpo follow Giovanni and make a disturbing discovery. Lorenzo has doubts about Franciscos strategy for the next game.

27.title: Joaco-Sport, una pasión
27.plot: Gabo tries to find out if Zoe is mad at him, while Ricky and Dedé follow Bruno to a spa. After an interview with Gabo on Joaquín's channel, Julián and his team show up there to answer in person.

28.title: Preparación para el partido, una pasión
28.plot: Vitto considers Francisco's behavior suspicious and is looking for talk with Diego. Dedé gets more and more stressed because of the game. Meanwhile, Lorenzo tries to pressure Dedé to get rid of a player.

29.title: Pedido a Dedé, una pasión
29.plot: Gabo wants to know more about the favor Lorenzo has asked Dedé. Finally, Gabo gets answers to his questions, whereupon he asks Zoe for advice. Joaquín participates in a major competition broadcast on television.

30.title: Halcones vs. Átomos, una pasión (parte 1)
30.plot: Due to tensions between the Hawks and their opponents, the Hawks are struggling to keep up with their opponents in the field. Meanwhile, Joaquín can once again shine on television with his football knowledge.

31.title: Halcones vs. Átomos, una pasión (parte 2)
31.plot: Dedé is getting more stressed because of the upcoming game. In addition, Lorenzo begins to pressure him to get rid of one of the players. While Vitto pursues a suspect, Zoe and Martina begin to argue.

32.title: Episodio 32
32.plot: Vitto and Pulpo learn more about the spy, who's after them while Gabo, Ricky and Dedé try to find out more about the medal. After Catorce's appointment as the fastest player, some players fear for their position.

33.title: Episodio 33
33.plot: The team suspects it will be spied on by Gabo, Ricky and Dedé. Gabo confirms this suspicion and urges the team to find out who is behind it. Meanwhile, Diego spins more intrigues to cause quarrels and unrest.

34.title: Episodio 34
34.plot: Ricky worries about his place in the team. Gabo and Lorenzo try to find out who shares information about the Hawks. Meanwhile, Francisco confronts Giovanni and learns about the alumni meeting.

35.title: Episodio 35
35.plot: Gabo, Ricky and Dedé continue to work on organizing Dora's party, but this time with Dora herself on board. Eventually, Diego finds a suitable scapegoat to blame on spying on the Hawk.

36.title: Episodio 36
36.plot: It succeeds Gabo, Rocky and Dedé to bring together Dora with their former students and narrow the circle of suspects a piece. To finally have more success with the girls, Lucas decides to undergo a complete renewal.

37.title: Episodio 37
37.plot: Out of anger to be just a substitute, Ricky makes a bad decision. Dedé is pursuing a plan that could have serious consequences, especially for him. Vitto and Pulpo are still convinced that Florencio spies on the team.

38.title: Episodio 38
38.plot: Gabo is still suffering from the serious consequences of Ricky's actions against him. Meanwhile Ezequiel arouses the suspicion that he wants to lose the game to sabotage his team.

39.title: Episodio 39
39.plot: Gabo finds out that the cause of his pain is not the supposed fracture, causing Vitto to show Amadeo Gabo's x-rays. Meanwhile, Diego and Francisco can not agree on Gabo's role in the next game.

40.title: Episodio 40
40.plot: Rafa and his father have a profound conversation. Although Gabo's ankle still causes pain, he can not be stopped from playing. Will Zoe manage to stop him?

70.title: Episodio 70
70.plot: Felipe insists that Gabo leaves. This leads to a dispute between the two. Ricky continues to try to balance the freestyle competition and the upcoming game. Pulpo is still worrying about the goalkeeper's performance.

71.title: Episodio 71
71.plot: Ricky and Daniel have a lot of trouble because they were trapped. Gabo and his friends are worried about where they are. The hawks mercilessly go down in the game. Lorenzo and Gabo are talking.

72.title: Episodio 72
72.plot: Francisco punishes Ricky and Daniel for their absence at play. Diego insists on defending Gabo before the Disciplinary Committee. Meanwhile, the relationship between Lorenzo and Gabo is improving.

73.title: Episodio 73
73.plot: Jaoquín is looking for a new assistant. Gabo is disappointed with the decision of the committee and is considering accepting Felipe's offer. Camilo's lies support his revenge plans.

74.title: Episodio 74
74.plot: Gabo and Lorenzo are facing the exclusion of the IAD. Nevertheless, Francisco allows the two to continue training. Gabo is looking for a direct conversation with the members of the team.

75.title: Episodio 75
75.plot: The truth about Gabo's case finally comes to light, but his fate is still hanging by a thread. Lorenzo is considering his relationship with Gabo. And he'll find out who's really behind Felipe's offer.

76.title: Episodio 76
76.plot: Diego changes the plan for his future at the IAD. Ezequiel confronts Camilo with his plan to take Lorenzo and Gabo out of the tournament. Diego and Francisco are talking. Gabo gives an interview to an unknown reporter.

77.title: Episodio 77
77.plot: Joaquín is angry that Gabo gave an interview. Gabo and his friends follow Lorenzo's group and find out what they do in the afternoons. Julia has some news for Gabo.

78.title: Episodio 78
78.plot: Gabo is very disturbed by the news about his father. Lorenzo tells Martina that he will stop keeping secrets from Gabo. The chances of victory are dwindling day by day.

79.title: Episodio 79
79.plot: Olson holds an oral exam to give students the opportunity to participate in the game. But not everyone can pass the test, so they can not change players in the match.

80.title: Episodio 80
80.plot: The decisive game presents the Hawks with special challenges. The positive development between Gabo and Lorenzo is also evident in their interaction.

cast.name: Del Rio, Franco De La Puente

imdb.title: Once
plot: Gabo is accepted to go to the IAD to become a professional football player.
